detectors.description:
BaseAdvertisement.isCampaignValid(bytes32) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c1/c18dac9b511bd8f99f5effd7a0d18152f965c393_ExtendedAdvertisementStorage.sol#1361-1368) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- validity && startDate < nowInMilliseconds && endDate > nowInMilliseconds (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c1/c18dac9b511bd8f99f5effd7a0d18152f965c393_ExtendedAdvertisementStorage.sol#1367)
